text: The Prime Minister of Zambia was the head of government of Zambia. the Prime Minister of Zambia was the President of Zambia serves as both the head of state and the head of government. ==List of Prime Minister of Zambia (1964–present)== ;Political parties * * * * Portrait Name Took office Left office Political party 1 Kenneth Kaunda 22 January 1964 24 October 1964 UNIP 1 Reuben Kamanga 24 October 1964 October 1967 UNIP 2 Simon Kapwepwe October 1967 October 1970 UNIP 3 Mainza Chona October 1970 August 1973 UNIP 1 Mainza Chona 25 August 1973 27 May 1975 UNIP 2 Elijah Mudenda 27 May 1975 20 July 1977 UNIP Mainza Chona 20 July 1977 15 June 1978 UNIP 3 Daniel Lisulo 15 June 1978 18 February 1981 UNIP 4 Nalumino Mundia 18 February 1981 24 April 1985 UNIP 5 Kebby Musokotwane 24 April 1985 15 March 1989 UNIP 6 Malimba Masheke 15 March 1989 31 August 1991 UNIP 4 Levy Mwanawasa 7 November 1991 3 July 1994 MMD 5 Godfrey Miyanda 4 July 1994 2 December 1997 MMD 6 Christon Tembo 2 December 1997 April 2001 MMD 7 Enoch Kavindele 4 May 2001 29 May 2003 MMD 8 Nevers Mumba 29 May 2003 4 October 2004 MMD 9 Lupando Mwape 4 October 2004 September 2006 MMD 10 Rupiah Banda 9 October 2006 2 November 2008 MMD 11 George Kunda 2 November 2008 23 September 2011 MMD 12 Guy Scott 23 September 2011 28 October 2014 PF 13 Inonge Wina 26 January 2015 24 August 2021 PF 14 Mutale Nalumango 24 August 2021 Incumbent UPND ==Related pages== *President of Zambia *Lists of office-holders ==References== ==Other websites== *World Statesmen – Zambia Zambia, Prime Minister of * Prime Ministers Category:1964 establishments in Northern Rhodesia Category:1964 disestablishments in Zambia Category:1973 establishments in Zambia Category:1991 disestablishments in Africa
